item.description:
You are invited to a benefit performance of:

PROPOSALS
By Neil Simon
It's a summer of romantic entanglements, which intertwine nine characters' lives on one idyllic
afternoon. Clemma, the family's housekeeper (and the story's narrator), dreads a visit from the husband who deserted her years before. Burt Hines, a recovering workaholic convalescing from a second heart attack, looks forward to the arrival of the ex-wife he still loves. Burt's daughter Josie has just broken her
engagement to an intense Harvard law student, and she pines for his buddy Ray, an aspiring writer with whom she once had a brief fling. Ray shows up with a strikingly dim-witted model on his arm, and a young Miami gangster with a gift for malapropisms brings comic hilarity to the gathering.

Wednesday May 21, 2008
At the Park Road Playhouse
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

6:15?7:15 pm Light Dinner, Beer and Wine
Play begins at 7:30 pm
Dessert and Coffee at Intermission

Tickets are $35.00 per person and include all refreshments

Proceeds benefit the YMCA Strong Kids Campaign
item.how_to_find_us: I will find out if you need to purchase tickets ahead of time.
item.why: Because you will be helping Children

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Proposal By Neil Simon and Light Dinner to benefit the YMCA Strong Kids Campaign
